instruction: How do I turn on the smartphone?
response: Press and hold the power button for a few seconds until the logo appears.

instruction: How do I turn off the smartphone?
response: Press and hold the power button, then choose “Power off” on the screen.

instruction: How do I take a screenshot?
response: Press the power button and the volume down button at the same time.

instruction: How do I increase the screen brightness?
response: Swipe down from the top and use the brightness slider.

instruction: How do I turn on the flashlight?
response: Open Quick Settings and tap the flashlight icon.

instruction: How do I change the wallpaper?
response: Go to Settings → Wallpaper and choose an image.

instruction: How do I turn on airplane mode?
response: Swipe down from the top and tap the airplane icon.

instruction: How do I change the ringtone volume?
response: Use the side volume buttons while on the home screen.

instruction: How can I check my OS version?
response: Open Settings → About phone to see the Android/iOS version.

instruction: How do I show battery percentage?
response: In display or battery settings, enable “Show battery percentage.”

instruction: How do I call a contact?
response: Open the Phone app, search or tap the contact, then press the call button.

instruction: How do I add a new contact?
response: In the Contacts app, tap “+” (Add) and fill in the details.

instruction: How do I delete a contact?
response: Open the contact, tap the menu or Edit, then choose Delete.

instruction: How do I hide my number when calling?
response: In call settings, enable “Hide caller ID” or “Show my caller ID: Off.”

instruction: How do I block a phone number?
response: From the call log, tap the number, then select Block/Report spam.

instruction: How do I enable call forwarding?
response: In call settings, open Call forwarding and set the destination number.

instruction: How do I send an SMS?
response: Open Messages → New message, enter the number or contact, type text, and send.

instruction: How do I attach a photo to an SMS?
response: Tap the attachment (+ or paperclip) icon in the message composer, then choose a photo.

instruction: How do I use voicemail?
response: Set up voicemail with your carrier or Voicemail app, then dial and follow prompts.

instruction: How do I see my call history?
response: Open the Phone app and go to the Recents or Call history tab.

instruction: How do I turn on Wi‑Fi?
response: Swipe down and tap the Wi‑Fi icon, or go to Settings → Wi‑Fi and toggle it on.

instruction: How do I connect to a new Wi‑Fi network?
response: In Settings → Wi‑Fi, choose the network and enter its password.

instruction: How do I turn on mobile data?
response: Open Quick Settings and enable Mobile data or Cellular data.

instruction: How do I enable 5G?
response: In cellular network settings, select 5G as the preferred network type (if supported).

instruction: How do I turn on a Wi‑Fi hotspot?
response: Go to Settings → Hotspot/Tethering and enable Wi‑Fi hotspot.

instruction: How do I change the hotspot password?
response: In Hotspot settings, edit the SSID and password fields.

instruction: How do I check data usage?
response: Open Settings → Network & Internet → Data usage (or Cellular) for statistics.

instruction: How do I disable internet for specific apps?
response: In app settings or Data usage controls, restrict background or mobile data.

instruction: How do I enable a VPN?
response: In Settings → VPN, add a VPN profile or open your VPN app and connect.

instruction: How do I forget saved Wi‑Fi networks?
response: In Wi‑Fi settings, tap a saved network and choose “Forget.”

instruction: How do I open the camera?
response: Tap the Camera app icon or double-press the power button (on supported devices).

instruction: How do I switch to the front camera?
response: Tap the camera switch icon to toggle between rear and front cameras.

instruction: How do I record a video?
response: In the Camera app, switch to Video mode and press the record button.

instruction: How do I use Night mode?
response: Select Night mode in the camera modes; keep the phone steady while shooting.

instruction: How do I enable HDR?
response: In camera settings or on-screen controls, turn on HDR (if available).

instruction: How do I set a camera timer?
response: Tap the timer icon in the camera and choose a countdown time.

instruction: How do I zoom in the camera?
response: Pinch to zoom on the viewfinder or tap the zoom levels (e.g., 2x).

instruction: How do I use the ultra‑wide camera?
response: Tap the ultra‑wide lens option (e.g., 0.5x) in the camera app.

instruction: How do I take burst photos?
response: Press and hold the shutter button to capture a burst series.

instruction: How do I shoot a panorama?
response: Select Panorama mode and follow the on-screen guide to move the phone.

instruction: How do I find my photos?
response: Open Photos/Gallery; use Albums or Search to locate images.

instruction: How do I delete a photo?
response: Open the photo and tap Delete; confirm to move it to the trash.

instruction: How do I restore deleted photos?
response: Open the Trash/Recently Deleted album and restore within the retention period.

instruction: How do I create a photo album?
response: In Photos/Gallery, tap Create album and add selected photos.

instruction: How do I edit a photo?
response: Open the photo, tap Edit, and adjust crop, exposure, or filters; save changes.

instruction: How do I send a photo in a chat app?
response: In the chat, tap + or the gallery icon and select the photo to send.

instruction: How do I transfer photos to a computer?
response: Connect via USB and choose File transfer (MTP) or use a cloud service.

instruction: How do I enable automatic photo backup?
response: Turn on sync in Google Photos or iCloud Photos in settings.

instruction: How do I hide or lock photos?
response: Use the “Locked folder”/Hidden album feature or a secure folder app.

instruction: How do I scan a document with my phone?
response: Use Google Drive, Files, or Notes app and choose Scan; align and save.

instruction: How do I install an app?
response: Use Google Play Store or Apple App Store to search and install.

instruction: How do I uninstall an app?
response: Long-press the app icon and choose Uninstall or Remove App.

instruction: How do I update apps?
response: Open the app store’s Updates section and tap Update or Update all.

instruction: How do I enable automatic app updates?
response: In the store settings, turn on Automatic updates over Wi‑Fi.

instruction: How do I disable app notifications?
response: Go to Settings → Notifications and turn off for specific apps.

instruction: How do I install an APK file?
response: Enable installs from unknown sources, then open the APK file (Android only).

instruction: How do I find an app on my phone?
response: Swipe down on the home screen and type the app name in Search.

instruction: How do I limit screen time for apps?
response: Use Digital Wellbeing/Screen Time to set app limits and downtime.

instruction: How do I move an app to another screen?
response: Long-press the icon and drag it to the desired home screen page.

instruction: How do I add a widget?
response: Long-press on the home screen and select Widgets, then choose one.

instruction: How do I set a lock screen password or PIN?
response: Go to Settings → Security/Face ID & Passcode and set a screen lock.

instruction: How do I set up a fingerprint unlock?
response: In Security settings, add a fingerprint and follow the enrollment steps.

instruction: How do I enable Face ID/face unlock?
response: In Security or Face ID settings, enroll your face following on-screen steps.

instruction: How do I find a lost phone?
response: Use Google Find My Device or Apple Find My to locate it on a map.

instruction: How do I erase my phone remotely if it’s lost?
response: From Find My Device/Find My, choose Erase device to wipe data remotely.

instruction: How do I turn on two-factor authentication?
response: Enable 2FA in your Google/Apple ID account security settings.

instruction: How do I review app permissions?
response: Open Settings → Privacy/Permissions and review per-app access.

instruction: How do I set auto-lock for the screen?
response: In Display or Security settings, choose Auto-lock/Screen timeout.

instruction: How do I boot into safe mode?
response: Press and hold power, then touch and hold “Power off” to enter Safe Mode (Android).

instruction: How do I encrypt my phone’s data?
response: In Security settings, enable device encryption (often on by default).

instruction: How do I enable battery saver mode?
response: Go to Settings → Battery and turn on Battery Saver/Low Power Mode.

instruction: How do I see which apps drain the battery?
response: Open Battery settings to view usage by app and screen time.

instruction: How do I use fast charging?
response: Use the original or certified fast charger and compatible cable.

instruction: How do I use wireless charging?
response: Place the phone on a compatible Qi wireless charging pad.

instruction: How do I extend battery life?
response: Lower brightness, disable unused radios (GPS/Wi‑Fi), and limit background apps.

instruction: How do I check battery health?
response: Open Battery settings for Battery health (on iOS) or use vendor tools on Android.

instruction: How do I enable optimized charging?
response: Turn on Optimized/Adaptive charging in Battery settings.

instruction: How do I check screen-on time?
response: Open Battery usage details; look for Screen on time.

instruction: How do I restrict background activity?
response: In Battery or App settings, limit background activity for selected apps.

instruction: How do I turn on ultra power-saving mode?
response: Enable Ultra power saving/Extreme battery saver in Battery settings.

instruction: How do I change the system language?
response: Go to Settings → Language & region and choose your language.

instruction: How do I enable dark mode?
response: In Display settings, turn on Dark theme/Appearance: Dark.

instruction: How do I change text size?
response: In Display settings, adjust Font size/Text size to your preference.

instruction: How do I change notification sounds?
response: Open Sound settings and choose tones for calls, messages, and alerts.

instruction: How do I set a custom ringtone?
response: In Sound settings, select Ringtone and pick a file or default tone.

instruction: How do I enable vibration?
response: In Sound or Accessibility settings, toggle Vibrate on ring/alerts.

instruction: How do I use live wallpapers?
response: Go to Wallpaper settings and choose a Live wallpaper (if supported).

instruction: How do I customize gesture navigation?
response: Open System settings → Gestures and adjust navigation options.

instruction: How do I enable Always‑On Display?
response: In Display settings, turn on Always‑On Display (device dependent).

instruction: How do I hide apps from the home screen?
response: Use Home screen settings or a secure folder to hide selected apps.

instruction: How do I enable Developer options?
response: Go to About phone and tap Build number seven times to unlock Developer options.

instruction: How do I record the screen?
response: Open Quick Settings and tap Screen recorder, then start recording.

instruction: How do I pair Bluetooth headphones?
response: Enable Bluetooth, open Bluetooth settings, and select the headphones to pair.

instruction: How do I share internet over Bluetooth?
response: Enable Bluetooth tethering in Hotspot & Tethering settings.

instruction: How do I connect my phone to a TV?
response: Use Chromecast, AirPlay, Miracast, or an HDMI adapter depending on the TV.

instruction: How do I transfer files via NFC?
response: Turn on NFC and use a supported sharing feature (varies by Android version).

instruction: How do I sync contacts with Google?
response: In Accounts settings, select Google and enable Contacts sync.

instruction: How do I move data to a new phone?
response: Use Android/Apple setup transfer tools or a cable for device-to-device migration.

instruction: How do I check for system updates?
response: Open Settings → Software update/System update and tap Check for updates.

instruction: How do I factory reset my phone?
response: Go to Settings → System/General → Reset → Erase all data (factory reset).
